Name: Seaberry Keep
About the game: Find your way out of a large castle mansion! Along the way, help dust the mansion, play games with ghosts, decorate multiple rooms, and grow your own flowers and strawberries, while getting to know the friendly residents of Seaberry Keep! Features Point & click gameplay 2D exploration Story voiced in English Decorating, gardening, hidden object, and other minigames
